article_node.title: Lululemon Embraces AI to Accelerate Design and Go-to-Market Processes
article_node.summary: Lululemon Athletica is hiring a chief AI & technology officer to speed product innovation and improve market responsiveness. The new role, filled by Ranju Das on September 2, 2025, will focus on AI-driven design, personalization, and supply‑chain efficiency. CEO Calvin McDonald cited declining U.S. sales and longer product life cycles as catalysts for the change, aiming to raise the share of new styles from 23% to 35% by next spring. The move signals a broader shift toward technology‑enabled agility amid competitive pressure in the premium athletic wear market.
